description: Dirichlet convolution of Ramanujan numbers (A000594) with themselves.
comments: Multiplicative because A000594 is. - _Christian G. Bower_, May 16 2005
formula: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} tau(d)tau(n/d) where tau(n) = A000594(n) is Ramanujan's tau function.
mathematica: a[n_] := DivisorSum[n, RamanujanTau[#]*RamanujanTau[n/#]&]; Array[a, 30] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 14 2015 *)
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = local(A); if( n<1, 0, A = Vec( eta(x + x^n*O(x))^24); sumdiv(n, d, A[d] * A[n/d]))}; /* _Michael Somos_, Jul 16 2004 */(Perl) use ntheory ":all"; for my $n (1..50) { say divisor_sum($n, sub { my $d=shift; ramanujan_tau($d)*ramanujan_tau($n/$d) } # _Dana Jacobsen_, Sep 05 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
